name: Any User Input in Figma
description:
Type any text you want into this beautiful input field! However you can only type lowercase latin alphabet and spaces. Add more characters and remix this wizardry!


üíñ Like and share this file: https://figma.fun/iIT6TI


To remove a character, you need to press backspace twice. It's done this way because otherwise you can't write one character twice like ‚Äúee‚Äù. That doesn't work because you can't open an overlay recursively from itself (although I'm sure it was possible before).
